Fixes: Fixed an issue with the settings tab injector and state watcher.
Fixed an issue with plugin dependencies, when trying to load an invalid plugin.

Changes: The styling of the changelog has been slightly modified (removed an annoying margin).
There are now fancy animations when the changelog is opened and closed.
The changelog now has a close button.
Internal DiscordInjections CSS (ex. command handler, changelog) has been centralized to a single CSS file: '/DomReady/style.css'. This is for easier development of new components.

New Stuff: There's this new fancy changelog thing in town. What's up with that?
The changelog will display the first time you boot up on a new version, or any time you use the 'changelog' command.
Fixes: Fixed DiscordCanary crashes due to webpack scanning.

Notice: This update was mainly just repairs to discord's WS changes (zlib).
Additionally, local messages procedures have been rewritten.

New Stuff: DI now hosts a local webserver so that CSS stuff resolves. Don't worry, the overhead on this is negligable. You can also disable it in the settings tab.
There are now 'diag' and 'udiag' commands for system diagnostics.
Changes: You can now specify custom file extensions to 'filter' for the file picker.
Fixes: The plugin loader now successfully ignores the readme.md files.
Newest Discord Canary support (Attention: Plugins might still break!)
Fixes the settings tabs appearing in guild settings, and other misc things.

Features: A generic mutation event in the StateWatcher!
Changes: Changes to plugin settings - can access from a .settings property
Fixes: Fixed the settings toggle switch! (for now)
Fixed the settings tab on different locales
